Row.Text: Consider assigning recently received Resources to one of your Cities or Towns.
Consider a Focus for your Town.
Your City is ready to claim and improve a new Rural tile, or assign a Specialist to a workable District.
Your Town is ready to claim and improve a new Rural tile.
Choose a new Technology to begin research.
Production has completed in this City. Choose what we shall produce next.
You have become Suzerain over a City-State. Choose which bonus this new ally will provide.
Choose a new Civic to begin studying.
Your people want to Celebrate this glorious time.
Your City can perform a ranged attack.
You have open Social Policy slots and Social Policies available to add to your Government.
You have open Crisis Policy slots and must choose Crisis Policies available to add to your Government.
You conquered a City this turn. Decide whether to keep, raze, or liberate it.
Move a Unit or have it perform an operation.
You have lost a {1_UnitName} due to damage from {2_PlotEffect}.
You have lost a {1_UnitName} due to stormy seas.
Your {1_UnitName} was damaged from travelling the high seas!
Your {1_UnitName} reinforcement was unable to reach the target {2_CommanderType}.
The {1_CommanderType} that your {2_UnitType} was reinforcing has been killed.
Another Civilization settled a new Town nearby.
Another Leader has started a {1_ProjectName} Action.
Another Leader has started an Endeavor.
Another Leader has started a Sanction.
Another Leader has started an Endeavor with you.
Another Leader has started a Sanction against you.
A diplomatic action is no longer being supported.
A Diplomatic Action is losing progress.
Your Diplomatic Action {1_ProjectName} with {2_LeaderName} has completed.
The {1_ProjectName} Diplomatic Action targeting you has completed.
The {1_ProjectName} Diplomatic Action from {2_LeaderName} targeting you has completed.
Your {1_ProjectName} Diplomatic Action has been canceled.
Your {1_ProjectName} Diplomatic Action with {2_LeaderName} has been canceled.
The {1_ProjectName} Diplomatic Action targeting you has been canceled.
The {1_ProjectName} Diplomatic Action from {2_LeaderName} targeting you has been canceled.
A diplomatic action, {1_ProjectName}, has been canceled.
A diplomatic action, {1_ProjectName} from {2_LeaderName}, has been canceled.
Diplomatic Action Canceled due to a lack of Influence
Your {1_ProjectName} Diplomatic Action has been canceled due to a lack of Influence.
Your {1_ProjectName} Diplomatic Action with {2_LeaderName} has been canceled due to a lack of Influence.
Your {1_ProjectName} diplomatic action has been canceled due to a lack of influence.
Your {1_ProjectName} diplomatic action has been canceled due to a lack of influence.
Alliance with {1_LeaderName} has ended due to our {2_CurrRel} Relationship.
{1_LeaderName} sparked a diplomatic incident.[n]Cause: {2_Cause}.[n]As a result, you gained {3_influence}[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence
{1_PlayerName} has started a Diplomatic Action with you. You must choose how you will respond to it.
Your ally {1_AllyName} has gone to war with {2_EnemyName}.
{1_EnemyName} has gone to war with you ally {2_AllyName}.
Your ally {1_Ally1Name} has gone to war with your ally {2_Ally2Name}.
The Agenda of {1_LeaderName} has changed your Relationship.
The Agenda of {1_LeaderName} has changed your Relationship.

You discovered {1_LeaderName} performing the Espionage Action {2_ActionName} against you. For being revealed they suffer a {3_PenaltyInfluence} Influence penalty for {4_PenaltyTurns} turns. {5_SuccessFailStr}
You discovered an unknown Leader performing the Espionage Action {2_ActionName} against you. {5_SuccessFailStr}
Your Action {2_ActionName} was discovered by {1_LeaderName}. For being revealed, you suffer a {3_PenaltyInfluence} Influence penalty for {4_PenaltyTurns} turns. {5_SuccessFailStr}
Your Action {2_ActionName} was not discovered by {1_LeaderName}. {5_SuccessFailStr}
It was successful. They gain the following effect: {1_EffectDetails}
It was successful. You gain the following effect: {1_EffectDetails}
Their Units have -3 Combat Strength for {1_EffectDuration} turns.
Our Units have -3 Combat Strength for {1_EffectDuration} turns.
You have vision of all of their Commanders for {1_EffectDuration} turns.
They have vision of all of our Commanders for {1_EffectDuration} turns.
We have destroyed their District defenses in {1_CityName}.
They have destroyed our District defenses in {1_CityName}.
We have destroyed their Rail Stations and Ports in {1_CityName}.
They have destroyed our Rail Stations and Ports in {1_CityName}.
We have converted {1_CityName} to our founded Religion.
They have converted {1_CityName} to their founded Religion.
We have spread rumors of fake Artifacts and disabled their Artifact yields.
They have spread rumors of fake Artifacts and disabled our Artifact yields.
We have pillaged their Treasure Resources and spawned a Treasure Convoy for ourselves in {1_CityName}.
They have pillaged our Treasure Resources and spawned a Treasure Convoy for themselves in {1_CityName}.
We have infiltrated their positions and their Units are now taking increased damage from Siege Units {1_EffectDuration} turns.
They have infiltrated our positions and our Units are now taking increased damage from Siege Units for {1_EffectDuration} turns.
We have sabotaged their space program. Production towards Launch Pads and the Launch Satellite project are halved.
They have sabotaged our space program. Production towards Launch Pads and the Launch Satellite project are halved.
We have caused an Ideological Revolt in {1_CityName}. The city infrastructure has been damaged.
They have caused an Ideological Revolt in {1_CityName}. Our city infrastructure has been damaged.
Choose a Government to steer your Civilization's identity.
Choose a Belief to enhance your Civilization.
Choose a selection from the Narrative Event.
Choose a selection from the Discovery.
Choose a selection from the event.
Quest "{1_title}" can no longer be completed.
Quest time running out. 5 Turns remaining.
Choose a Pantheon to alter your Civilization.
Create a Religion to enhance your Civilization.

You have begun research on {1_IdeologyName} and are now a permanent member of that Ideology. Your Relationship with other Leaders will increase if they follow your Ideology, and decrease if they follow a different Ideology.
We have revealed a new Civics tree: {1_TreeName}.
You have enough {1_AttributeName} Points to purchase a new skill!
We have discovered a new continent. Our explorer is naming it {1_ContinentName}.
We have spotted Barbarians approaching our City of {1_CityName}.
We have received rumors that a new tribe of Barbarians have moved into a nearby region.
The Independent Power of {1_IPName} has been dispersed. You have received {2_reward} [{3_YieldIcon}]{4_YieldType}.
{1_CivName} has finished constructing the World Wonder {2_WonderName}.
You have finished constructing the World Wonder {1_WonderName}.
An unmet player has finished constructing the World Wonder {1_WonderName}.

You were not able to complete the World Wonder {1_WonderName} in time. However {2_Production} [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production has been salvaged from the attempt and awarded to the City of {3_CityName}.
{1_Leader} has become the Suzerain of the new City-State of {2_CityStateName} and assigned it the bonus: {3_BonusName}
The Capital of {1_CivName} has been captured by {2_CivName}!
An enemy has taken over control of a District in {1_CityName}!
You have met a new Civilization
You have met a new City-State
An unmet Leader has been defeated.
An unmet City-State has been defeated.
Your team has claimed the '{1_VictoryName}` victory!
An unmet Leader has claimed the '{1_VictoryName}' victory!
An unmet team has claimed the '{1_VictoryName}' victory!
Select one of your Towns as your Capital for this Age.
Create your advanced start to begin this Age.
Choose the Legacies you want to enshrine as you enter this Age.
Your Civilization has discovered the Natural Wonder {1_NaturalWonderName}.
Your Civilization run out of Gold and has no Gold income! Cities will become Unhappy and Units may be forced to disband.
Your Civilization has regained positive Gold income. Cities will begin to stabilize and forced disbanding of Units will stop.
{1_CityName} does not have enough Food to feed itself! If this continues, the City will lose Buildings as its Urban Population panics.
{1_CityName} is starving! Urban Population is close to fleeing the City in panic!
Starvation in {1_CityName} has caused citizens to panic and abandon its {2_BuildingName}!
The Resource {1_ResourceName}, previously in {2_CityName}, is no longer valid there and is now unassigned.
{1_CivName} has pillaged {LOC_GRAMMAR_A_AN << {2_Constructible}} in the settlement of {3_SettlementName}.
{1_LeaderName} has plundered your Trade Route from {1_CityName} to {2_CityName}. Resources received along that route have been lost.
The foreign Settlement {1_CityName} has added {2_ResourceName} to your Trade Route. You can now assign this Resource to one of your Settlements.
The foreign Settlement {1_CityName} has lost access to {2_ResourceName} and it is no longer shipping over your Trade Route.
New Foreign Trade Route To You
{1_LeaderName} has established a new Trade Route to your Settlement, {2_CityName}. This route provides you with the following yields each turn: {3_YieldString}
{1_CityName} is not providing enough Happiness for its Population.
{1_CityName} is very Unhappy and growing restless. Soon it may riot and start destroying Buildings!
Our settlement of {1_CityName} has been fully converted by foreign Missionaries and is now following the religion of {2_ReligionName}.
Unhappy citizens riot in {1_CityName}! An angry mob has destroyed the {2_BuildingName}!
Your[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold balance is negative and you cannot afford to pay your troops.[n]Your {1_UnitName} has disbanded.
Your Commander has encountered an enemy Army. You must deploy your troops in order to attack.
After being defeated, your {1_CommanderType} has returned to fight again.
{1_VolcanoName} has become active. Beware -- it can now erupt at any time!
{1_VolcanoName} is no longer active. The risk or eruption has passed.
The river {1_RiverName} has flooded. Thankfully damage appears to be light.
The {1_RiverName} has flooded. Damage in the area is severe.
The {1_RiverName} has flooded and devastated the area as never seen before.

A {1_StormType} has developed and is headed to the {3_Direction}. The storm will cause destruction over the next two turns. (With its arrival there were {4_Tiles} {4_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {5_Pop} Population lost, {6_Units} {6_Units: plural 1?Unit; other?Units;} killed, {7_Yields} {7_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} gained fertility)

A {1_StormType} named {2_StormName} has developed and is headed to the {3_Direction}. The storm will cause destruction over the next two turns. (With its arrival there were {4_Tiles} {4_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {5_Pop} Population lost, {6_Units} {6_Units: plural 1?Unit; other?Units;} killed, {7_Yields} {7_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} gained fertility)

A {1_StormType} has developed and is headed to the {3_Direction}. The storm will cause destruction over the next two turns. (With its arrival there were {4_Tiles} {4_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {5_Pop} Population lost, {6_Units} {6_Units: plural 1?Unit; other?Units;} killed, {7_Yields} {7_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} lost fertility)

A {1_StormType} named {2_StormName} has developed and is headed to the {3_Direction}. The storm will cause destruction over the next two turns. (With its arrival there were {4_Tiles} {4_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {5_Pop} Population lost, {6_Units} {6_Units: plural 1?Unit; other?Units;} killed, {7_Yields} {7_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} lost fertility)

The {1_StormType} continues its movement and is now headed to the {3_Direction}. (During this turn there were {4_Tiles} {4_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {5_Pop} Population lost, {6_Units} {6_Units: plural 1?Unit; other?Units;} killed, {7_Yields} {7_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} gained fertility)

The {1_StormType} named {2_StormName} continues its movement and is now headed to the {3_Direction}. (During this turn there were {4_Tiles} {4_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {5_Pop} Population lost, {6_Units} {6_Units: plural 1?Unit; other?Units;} killed, {7_Yields} {7_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} gained fertility)

The {1_StormType} continues its movement and is now headed to the {3_Direction}. (During this turn there were {4_Tiles} {4_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {5_Pop} Population lost, {6_Units} {6_Units: plural 1?Unit; other?Units;} killed, {7_Yields} {7_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} lost fertility)

The {1_StormType} named {2_StormName} continues its movement and is now headed to the {3_Direction}. (During this turn there were {4_Tiles} {4_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {5_Pop} Population lost, {6_Units} {6_Units: plural 1?Unit; other?Units;} killed, {7_Yields} {7_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} lost fertility)

The {1_StormType}, now weaker, has made its final move across the map. (During this turn there were {3_Tiles} {3_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {4_Pop} population lost, {5_Units} {5_Units: plural 1?unit; other?units;} killed, {6_Yields} {6_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} gained fertility)

The {1_StormType} named {2_StormName}, now weaker, has made its final move across the map. (During this turn there were {3_Tiles} {3_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {4_Pop} population lost, {5_Units} {5_Units: plural 1?unit; other?units;} killed, {6_Yields} {6_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} gained fertility)

The {1_StormType}, now weaker, has made its final move across the map. (During this turn there were {3_Tiles} {3_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {4_Pop} population lost, {5_Units} {5_Units: plural 1?unit; other?units;} killed, {6_Yields} {6_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} lost fertility)

The {1_StormType} named {2_StormName}, now weaker, has made its final move across the map. (During this turn there were {3_Tiles} {3_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {4_Pop} population lost, {5_Units} {5_Units: plural 1?unit; other?units;} killed, {6_Yields} {6_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} lost fertility)
{1_VolcanoName} has erupted. Thankfully damage appears to be light.
{1_VolcanoName} has erupted. Damage in the area is severe.
{1_VolcanoName} has erupted in one of the deadliest explosions known to mankind.

A {1_PlagueName} has occurred in the settlement of {2_CityName}. (During this turn there were {3_Tiles} {3_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {4_Pop} population lost, {5_Yields} {5_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} gained fertility)

A {1_PlagueName} has occurred in the settlement of {2_CityName}. (During this turn there were {3_Tiles} {3_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {4_Pop} population lost, {5_Yields} {5_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} gained fertility)

The {1_PlagueName} has spread to the settlement of {2_CityName} from {3_CityName}. (During this turn there were {4_Tiles} {4_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {5_Pop} population lost, {6_Yields} {6_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} gained fertility)
The settlement of {1_CityName} is free from plague.
The settlement of {1_CityName} is on the brink of Revolt. If they remain Unhappy for {2_Duration} turns, they may Revolt.
The Great Work {1_Name} has been added to your Archive.
The Great Work {1_Name} has been added to the {2_Building} in the Settlement of {3_City}.
{2_CompletionPct: percent} progress has already been made toward completing this Age.
Completion of the {1_Age} Age is imminent!
Only {3_RemainingPct: percent} progress is remaining before the Age will complete!
While in [B]Just One More Turn[/B] mode, you may play for as many turns as you'd like. To leave [B]Just One More Turn[/B] mode, select [B]No More Turns[/B] from the Pause menu.
{1_playerName} is joining the game. The game will reload and resume once they are ready.
{1_playerName}'s game has deviated from the host's. Everyone will reload to correct the problem.
The game is migrating to a new game host. The game will resume shortly.
{1_FriendName} has invited you to a multiplayer game.
You have an incoming peace deal!
You have an adjusted peace deal!
Your peace deal has been accepted!
Your peace deal has been rejected!
